channel.title: Nacos on 小丛路子野
channel.description: Recent content in Nacos on 小丛路子野

item.title: Centos下安装Nacos
item.description: 下载安装包 https://github.com/alibaba/nacos/releases 解压并移动至安装目录 1 2 tar -zxvf nacos-server-2.2.3.tar.gz mv nacos /usr/local 需要配置Java环境 1 2 3 4 export JAVA_HOME=/usr/local/java/jdk17.0.4.1 export JRE_HOME=${JAVA_HOME}/jre export CLASSPATH=.:${JAVA_HOME}/lib:${JRE_HOME}/lib export PATH={JAVA_HOME}/bin:$PATH 编辑application.properties 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 cd /usr/local/nacos/conf
